Created by IntelliJ IDEA. User: Sven-Ivar Fjeld Date: 31-Aug-2004 Time: 19:12:30 convenience methods for random number generation (e.g. a d20 roll) and querying (such as what is the ability modifier of, say, 18).

pickNumber

public static java.lang.Integer pickNumber(int inclusiveLowerLimit,
                                           int inclusiveUpperLimit)
Get a single random integer in the range 0 (inclusive) to N (inclusive).

Important: if this method is called multiple times in rapid succession, it will return the SAME result.

Parameters:
inclusiveLowerLimit -
inclusiveUpperLimit - must be greater than 0.
Returns:
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param does not comply.
